import React from 'react' import * as Form from '@radix-ui/react-form'; import { useRef } from 'react'; function ClubForm() { const name = useRef(); const email = useRef(); const userClass = useRef(); const submitHandler = () => { console.log(email.current.value); fetch("http://localhost:4000/register", { method: 'POST', headers: { Accept: 'application.json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'x-access-token': 'yJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6IjY0Yjk5NWQ5MmFlOTI3YzcyNDlmZGEyYyIsImlhdCI6MTY4OTg4NDEyMSwiZXhwIjoxNjg5OTcwNTIxfQ.XtG2CjKF8yfdqQSTiAix2Z_gWkZ7zRgbsuk4zxvu25c', }, body: "1", }) } return (
